Consider remortgaging after the tie-in period to avoid this fee.

mortgage_steps.title: Deeds Release Fee:
tasks: Paid to release property's title deeds to your solicitor.
Typically between £50 and £300, check original paperwork.

tasks: Covers lender's administration costs.
Ranges from £1,000 to £2,000, consider upfront payment or adding to the mortgage.

tasks: Non-refundable fee to secure a fixed-rate, tracker, or discount deal.
Rare but may range from £100 to £300.

mortgage_steps.title: Valuation Fee:
tasks: Often included in remortgage packages.
If not, expect to pay £300 to £500 for property valuation.

mortgage_steps.title: Conveyancing Fee:
tasks: Legal work to remove original lender's interest and register the new lender.
Around £350, may be covered by the new lender.

mortgage_steps.title: Broker Fee (if applicable):
tasks: Charged by brokers, ranging from £300 to 1% of the loan amount.
Some brokers are fee-free; negotiate fees based on commission.

Calculate exact monthly payments using a mortgage calculator.
